Getting started

Project in development

This project is currently in development. Please excuse the incomplete documentation while we continue working.

CDN

You can easily access the compiled CSS for Apollo using one of the CDN endpoints. This is the fastest way to start using Apollo styles in your project.

Expanded CSS
Minified CSS
Package Management

The source files for Apollo UI, including useful variables and mixins, are available through NPM and Bower. Use one of these options to add the Apollo framework to your front-end build system.

NPM
Bower
